examples.example: 妈妈总是把我的衣服洗得干干净净，整整齐齐。

translate.english: Mother always washes my clothes clean and tidy.

examples.example: 我穿着漂亮的衣服，心情格外舒畅，充满自信地迎接新的一天。

translate.english: I am wearing beautiful clothes, feeling extremely comfortable and confidently greeting the new day.

examples.example: 我买了新衣服，感觉自己变得更加精神焕发了。

translate.english: I bought new clothes and feel that I have become more energetic.
